# GRAPHICS::SET_CHECKPOINT_INSIDE_CYLINDER_SCALE

## Summary
Scales any chevron/flag etc inside a cylinder

## Parameters
* **CHECKPOINT_INDEX** uniqueCheckpoint
* **FLOAT** insideCylinderScale
